items.content_html: This project is a backend + frontend implementation of a mini social network built using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, following a microservices architecture. The project also includes a lightweight React frontend to interact with the services.
items.title: koutamMoulaye/ProjectApiServicesJavaScript: This project is a backend + frontend implementation of a mini social network built using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, following a microservices architecture. The project also includes a lightweight React frontend to interact with the services.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: Automate image selection on Leonardo.AI with one click! This lightweight tool helps you: Bulk-select images effortlessly Works via Tampermonkey, browser console, or bookmarklet Human-like delays to avoid detection Perfect for designers, social media managers & AI enthusiasts. Free & open-source.
items.title: alexandrecoder/Auto-Select-Images-for-Leonardo.AI: Automate image selection on Leonardo.AI with one click! This lightweight tool helps you:  Bulk-select images effortlessly  Works via Tampermonkey, browser console, or bookmarklet  Human-like delays to avoid detection  Perfect for designers, social media managers & AI enthusiasts. Free & open-source.
